MemberSignature.Value: public System.Collections.Generic.IList<Microsoft.Azure.Batch.BatchClientBehavior> CustomBehaviors { get; set; }
.property instance class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<class Microsoft.Azure.Batch.BatchClientBehavior> CustomBehaviors

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a list of behaviors that modify or customize requests to the Batch service made via this .

remarks.para: These behaviors are inherited by child objects.
Modifications are applied in the order of the collection. The last write wins.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void Delete (Nullable<bool> recursive = null, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<Microsoft.Azure.Batch.BatchClientBehavior> additionalBehaviors = null);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Delete(valuetype System.Nullable`1<bool> recursive, class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class Microsoft.Azure.Batch.BatchClientBehavior> additionalBehaviors) cil managed

Docs.param: If the file-path parameter represents a directory instead of a file, you can set the optional recursive parameter to true to delete the directory and all of the files and subdirectories in it. If recursive is false then the directory must be empty or deletion will fail.
A collection of BatchClientBehavior instances that are applied after the CustomBehaviors on the current object.
Docs.summary: Blocking call to delete the file.

A collection of BatchClientBehavior instances that are applied after the CustomBehaviors on the current object.
